title: What happens when Truth and Justice have a Brawl?
description:
Notes from "Cosette" in Victor Hugo's Les Misérables

This is episode 33 of my podcast. 

This is the second part of Les Miserables. Aside from other things, I talk about truth, types of worlds, the nature of justice, the nature of being, the ways in which evil and good connect, and more. This book is fascinating. I'm trying to sort out a lot of things here and am thinking out loud. Welcome aboard.

Make sure to like and subscribe!

Check out my podcast: Fining Ideas | The Colton Kirby Show: https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

--Links--
My Website: https://www.coltonkirby.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Parler: https://parler.com/profile/coltonkirby/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/_coltonkirby/
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/coltonjkirby/
Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Colton-Kirby-7
